description:
Whether you’re out hiking, find yourself in an emergency, or just doing everyday things, the Gerber Gear Dime 12-in-1 Mini Multi-Tool can be super useful to have. Now that it’s available with a 25 percent discount for a mere $21.75, it’s the perfect time to add this one to your cart and discover the wonders of having the right tool for the right job all the time.

This compact multi-tool offers 12 essential functions, including needle nose pliers, wire cutters, tweezers, a bottle opener, retail package opener, plain edge blade folding knife, scissors, small and medium flat head drivers, fine and coarse files. Th
title: Get dad this 12-function multi-tool for $22

description:

title: Marvel Midnight Suns is free on Epic right now

description:
Sure, a gaming laptop with all the bells and whistles is fantastic, but it’s expensive. There’s something to be said about a laptop with decent hardware that’s affordable, though, such as the Dell Inspiron 15, which is now available for a mere $400.

This particular configuration of the Dell Inspiron 15 has an MSRP of $630. Now that it’s available with such a price cut, it’s an even more impressive price point for a laptop with an Intel Core i5 processor. The processor will all
title: This $400 Dell Inspiron laptop is perfect for your daily workload

description:
I don’t know how your pets act, but mine tend to misbehave when we’re not at home. In such situations, being able to keep an eye on them while away can be super helpful, especially when the camera is so affordable. The Wyze Cam v4 is only $25.98 right now, a brand new best price for this tiny 1440p camera.

With an MSRP of $35.98, the Wyze Cam v4 is just what you need to keep an eye on your home, pets, and kids, or just for some extra security. The new 28 percent discount makes this camera an even more enticing purchase.

With a 2560×1440 QHD resolution, the Wyze Cam v4 delivers excellent image qua
title: Get this indoor/outdoor security camera for an absurdly low $25
